pkgmetadata.longdescription: Secure in-Browser and Database Storage for 'shiny' Inputs, Outputs, Views and User Likes // Store persistent and synchronized data from 'shiny' inputs within the browser. Refresh 'shiny' applications and preserve user-inputs over multiple sessions. A database-like storage format is implemented using 'Dexie.js' https://dexie.org, a minimal wrapper for 'IndexedDB'. Transfer browser link parameters to 'shiny' input or output values. Store app visitor views, likes and followers.
